mapper.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) OVER () filtered_count, evt.evt_no, evt.evt_io_type, evt.evt_cmd_param, evt.evt_st, dbo.getStringToDateTime(evt.reg_dt) AS reg_dt, evt.req_cntn, evt.rslt_cd, evt.rslt_msg, evt.rcv_cntn, dbo.getStringToDateTime(evt.rcv_dt) AS rcv_dt, evt.agt_cd, evt.sche_kind FROM agt_event evt
mapper.insert:
SELECT B.agt_cd + CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) + A.seq AS evtNo, B.agt_cd AS agtCd FROM ( SELECT RIGHT('0000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ISNULL(MAX(SUBSTRING(I.evt_no, 14, 7)), '0000000') + 1), 7) As SEQ FROM agt_event I cross join agt_agent C WHERE I.evt_no LIKE C.agt_cd + CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) + '%' ) A cross join agt_agent B WHERE B.agt_cd = #{agtCd}
INSERT INTO agt_event ( evt_no, evt_io_type, evt_cmd_param, evt_st, reg_dt, req_cntn, rslt_cd, rslt_msg, rcv_cntn, rcv_dt, agt_cd, sche_kind ) VALUES ( #{evtNo}, #{evtIoType}, #{evtCmdParam}, #{evtSt}, CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) + REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 114), ':', ''), #{reqCntn}, #{rsltCd}, #{rsltMsg}, #{rcvCntn}, NULL, #{agtCd}, #{scheKind} )
mapper.update: UPDATE agt_event SET rslt_cd = #{rsltCd}, rslt_msg = #{rsltMsg}, rcv_cntn = #{rcvCntn}, rcv_dt = CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) + REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 114), ':', ''), evt_st = #{evtSt} WHERE evt_no = #{evtNo}
